<html lang="en">

    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

    <style>
        :root {
            --baby-purple: #e6d7ff;
            --light-purple: #d0b0ff;
            --medium-purple: #9370DB;
            --indigo: #4b0082;
            --white: #ffffff;
        }

            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;

            100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }

                    <option value="">Select your country</option>

                    <!-- Add more countries as needed -->
                </select>
            </div>
            <button class="submit-btn" id="submitSignup">Continue</button>

            <i class="fas fa-star star" style="top: 15%; left: 5%;"></i>
            <i class="fas fa-star star" style="top: 25%; right: 5%;"></i>
            <i class="fas fa-feather-alt flower" style="bottom: 5%; right: 5%; font-size: 1.8rem; transform: rotate(-15deg);"></i>
        </div>

        <div id="page3" class="ai-intro">
            <h1 class="ai-title"><span>G</span><span>Ai</span></h1>

            <button class="continue-btn" id="meetAi">Meet Your AI</button>

                <i class="fas fa-robot"></i>

                Hello! I'm your personal AI assistant. Together, we'll explore new possibilities and solve complex problems.
            </p>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <script>
        // Welcome popup animation
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const welcomePopup = document.getElementById('welcomePopup');
            const mainContainer = document.getElementById('mainContainer');
            const showSignup = document.getElementById('showSignup');
            const submitSignup = document.getElementById('submitSignup');
            const meetAi = document.getElementById('meetAi');
            
            // Hide welcome popup after 3 seconds and show main content
            setTimeout(function() {
                welcomePopup.style.opacity = '0';
                setTimeout(function() {
                    welcomePopup.style.display = 'none';
                    mainContainer.style.display = 'flex';
                    document.getElementById('page1').style.display = 'block';
                }, 1000);
            }, 3000);
            
            // Navigation between pages
            showSignup.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                document.getElementById('page1').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('page2').style.display = 'flex';
            });
            
            submitSignup.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // In a real app, you would validate the form here
                document.getElementById('page2').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('page3').style.display = 'flex';
            });
            
            meetAi.addEventListener('click', function() {
                document.getElementById('page3').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('page4').style.display = 'flex';
            });
            
            // Create additional decorative stars
            for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
                const star = document.createElement('i');
                star.className = 'fas fa-star star';
                star.style.top = Math.random() * 100 + '%';
                star.style.left = Math.random() * 100 + '%';
                star.style.fontSize = (Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.5) + 'rem';
                star.style.animationDelay = Math.random() * 2 + 's';
                document.body.appendChild(star);
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```

## Key Features:

1. **Beautiful Welcome Popup** - Appears first and fades away after 3 seconds
2. **Main Landing Page** with:
   - "G.Ai*2+2=1" title
   - Google and Facebook sign-in buttons
   - "Sign Up" link for new users
   - Decorative flowers and twinkling indigo stars

3. **Sign Up Form** with:
   - Name, Age, Email, and Country fields
   - Beautiful light purple styling
   - More decorative elements

4. **AI Introduction Page** with:
   - "G" that jumps up and down
   - "AI" that glows with a purple light
   - Smooth transition button

5. **Final AI Display Page** with:
   - Animated AI avatar
   - Welcome message
   - Clean, elegant design

6. **Responsive Design** - Works well on both desktop and mobile devices

7. **Smooth Animations** throughout the experience

The entire design uses a light baby purple color scheme with indigo accents as you requested, creating a beautiful, futuristic yet classic look.   Correct the mistake in the code
### BLACKBOX.AI

The code you provided is mostly well-structured, but there are a few improvements and corrections that can be made to enhance functionality and ensure proper behavior. Here are some corrections and enhancements:

1. **Welcome Popup Animation**: The welcome popup should not just fade out but also ensure that the main content is displayed correctly afterward.

2. **Form Validation**: While the signup form does not currently validate inputs, it's a good practice to add basic validation.

3. **Responsive Design**: Ensure that all elements are responsive and adjust properly on smaller screens.

4. **Accessibility**: Add `aria-labels` or `role` attributes where necessary for better accessibility.

Here’s the corrected and improved version of your HTML code:

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>G.Ai*2+2=1</title>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:wght@300;400;600;700&family=Dancing+Script:wght@700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0-beta3/css/all.min.css">
    <style>
        :root {
            --baby-purple: #e6d7ff;
            --light-purple: #d0b0ff;
            --medium-purple: #9370DB;
            --indigo: #4b0082;
            --white: #ffffff;
        }
        
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
            background-color: var(--baby-purple);
            color: var(--indigo);
            overflow-x: hidden;
            transition: background-color 0.5s;
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
        }
        
        /* Welcome Popup */
        .welcome-popup {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            z-index: 1000;
            opacity: 1;
            transition: opacity 1s ease-out;
        }
        
        .welcome-content {
            background-color: var(--white);
            padding: 40px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .welcome-content h1 {
            font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
            font-size: 3rem;
            color: var(--medium-purple);
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .welcome-content p {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .welcome-content::before {
            content: "";
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;

        }

            font-weight: 700;
        }

            background-color: var(--white);

        }

            display: flex;

            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        }
        
        .form-group input:focus, .form-group select:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: var(--medium-purple);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(147, 112, 219, 0.2);
        }
        
        .submit-btn {
            background-color: var(--medium-purple);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            padding: 12px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background-color 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
            margin-top: 10px;
        }
        
        .submit-btn:hover {
            background-color: var(--indigo);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        /* Page 3 - AI Introduction */
        .ai-intro {
            display: none;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            height: 70vh;
        }
        
        .ai-title {
            font-size: 5rem;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .ai-title span:first-child {
            display: inline-block;
            animation: jump 1s infinite alternate;
            color: var(--medium-purple);
        }
        
        .ai-title span:last-child {
            animation: glow 2s infinite alternate;
            color: var(--indigo);
        }
        
        @keyframes jump {
            0% { transform: translateY(0); }
            100% { transform: translateY(-20px); }
        }
        
        @keyframes glow {
            0% { text-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--light-purple); }
            100% { text-shadow: 0 0 20px var(--medium-purple), 0 0 30px var(--light-purple); }
        }
        
        .continue-btn {
            background-color: var(--indigo);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            padding: 15px 30px;
            border-radius: 30px;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }
        
        .continue-btn:hover {
            background-color: var(--medium-purple);
            transform: scale(1.05);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
        
        /* Page 4 - AI Display */
        .ai-display {
            display: none;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            height: 80vh;
        }
        
        .ai-avatar {
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--light-purple), var(--medium-purple));
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            animation: pulse 3s infinite;
        }
        
        .ai-avatar i {
            font-size: 5rem;
            color: white;
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }
        
        .ai-message {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            max-width: 600px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }
        
        /* Responsive adjustments */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .main-title, .ai-title {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }
            
            .auth-options, .signup-form {
                padding: 30px 20px;
            }
            
            .ai-title {
                font-size: 3.5rem;
            }
        }
    </style>

    <script>
        // Welcome popup animation
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const welcomePopup = document.getElementById('welcomePopup');
            const mainContainer = document.getElementById('mainContainer');
            const showSignup = document.getElementById('showSignup');
            const submitSignup = document.getElementById('submitSignup');
            const meetAi = document.getElementById('meetAi');
            
            // Hide welcome popup after 3 seconds and show main content
            setTimeout(function() {
                welcomePopup.style.opacity = '0';
                setTimeout(function() {
                    welcomePopup.style.display = 'none';
                    mainContainer.style.display = 'flex';
                    document.getElementById('page1').style.display = 'block';
                }, 1000);
            }, 3000);
            
            // Navigation between pages
            showSignup.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                document.getElementById('page1').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('page2').style.display = 'flex';
            });
            
            submitSignup.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // Basic form validation
                const name = document.getElementById('name').value;
                const age = document.getElementById('age
